{{aside( page="plugins index")}}

Renders the contents of the plugin inside a box. Also has an optional title, passed as a parameter to the plugin.

Uses the webwidgets box tags. If the box doesn't appear correct, check if you
have defined the box's css correctly.

! Plugin Details

{{plugin( plugin="box" ) }}

! Example
{{{
{{box( title="Hello" )
This is an example box
}}
}}}

{{box( title="Hello" )
This is an example box
}}
